languages.text: "Понятие "ереси" {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}с трудом подходит{/d} к людям нашего ремесла, {name}. Но в одном ты прав{mf||а} — Эмелина перешла черту, которая отделяет служителя Империума от заблуждающегося хаосопоклонника".

"The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."
languages.original_text: "Понятие "ереси" {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}с трудом подходит{/d} к людям нашего ремесла, {name}. Но в одном ты прав{mf||а} — Эмелина перешла черту, которая отделяет служителя Империума от заблуждающегося хаосопоклонника".

traits.locale_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is hardly applicable to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is hardly applicable to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is hardly applicable to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “对我们这一行的人而言，并{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}不存在{/d}‘异端邪说’这个概念，{name}。但有一点你说得没错，帝国的仆人与崇拜混沌的疯子之间有一条红线，而艾米莉娜已经跨过了这条红线。”
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: “对我们这一行的人而言，并不存在‘异端邪说’这个概念，{name}。但有一点你说得没错，帝国的仆人与崇拜混沌的疯子之间有一条红线，而艾米莉娜已经跨过了这条红线。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La noción de la "herejía" {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}no se aplica{/d} a nuestra profesión, {name}. Pero tiene razón en una cosa: Emelina ha cruzado la línea que separa a una súbdita del Imperium de una adoradora del Caos delirante».
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: «La noción de la "herejía" no se aplica a nuestra profesión, {name}. Pero tiene razón en una cosa: Emelina ha cruzado la línea que separa a una súbdita del Imperium de una adoradora del Caos delirante».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「『異端』という概念は、我らのような仕事に就いている者には{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}ほとんど当てはまらない{/d}のです、{name}さん。しかし、御身は一つのことについては正しい。エメリナさんは帝国の奉仕者と、惑わされた混沌の崇拝者とを隔てる一線を越えたのです」
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: 「『異端』という概念は、我らのような仕事に就いている者には{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}ほとんど当てはまらない{/d}のです、{name}さん。しかし、御身は一つのことについては正しい。エメリナさんは帝国の奉仕者と、惑わされた混沌の崇拝者とを隔てる一線を越えたのです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « La notion d'hérésie {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}ne s'applique pas vraiment{/d} aux individus occupant des fonctions telles que les nôtres, {name}. Cela dit, vous avez raison sur un point : Emelina a franchi la limite qui sépare une servante de l'Imperium d'une adoratrice du Chaos. »
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: « La notion d'hérésie ne s'applique pas vraiment aux individus occupant des fonctions telles que les nôtres, {name}. Cela dit, vous avez raison sur un point : Emelina a franchi la limite qui sépare une servante de l'Imperium d'une adoratrice du Chaos. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Begriff 'Ketzerei' ist in unserer Profession {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}wohl kaum anwendbar{/d}, {name}. Aber mit einem habt Ihr recht – Emelina hat die Grenze zwischen einer Dienerin des Imperiums und einer verwirrten Chaosanbeterin überschritten."
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: "Der Begriff 'Ketzerei' ist in unserer Profession wohl kaum anwendbar, {name}. Aber mit einem habt Ihr recht – Emelina hat die Grenze zwischen einer Dienerin des Imperiums und einer verwirrten Chaosanbeterin überschritten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "'Kâfirlik', bizim çalışma alanımızdakilerde {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}pek de görülen{/d} bir şey olmasa da bir konuda haklısın {name}. Emelina, İmparatorluk hizmetkârı olmak ile kendini tuzağa kaptırıp Kaosçu'ya dönüşmek arasındaki çizgiyi aşmış."
languages.original_text: "The notion of 'heresy' is {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}hardly applicable{/d} to people in our line of work, {name}. But you are correct about one thing — Emelina has crossed the line that separates a servant of the Imperium from a deluded Chaos worshipper."

traits.locale_text: "'Kâfirlik', bizim çalışma alanımızdakiler için kullanılmaya {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}pek de uygun bir kavram değildir{/d} {name} ama tek bir konuda haklısın: Emelina bir İmparatorluk hizmetkârıyla, kendini bir tuzağa kaptırmış ve Kaos'a tapınmaya başlamış biri arasındaki çizgiyi aşmış."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
